name: Voltar
description: Voltar is a vintage oscilloscope-themed robot with a vibrant orange box and classic soldier-style buttons. Its arms and legs are designed in a classic fashion, providing it with a timeless look. The screen of Voltar displays a game of snake, adding a touch of nostalgia. To complete its appearance, Voltar is equipped with a pair of stylish glasses, giving it a distinctive and unique character. Voltar is a member of the WebtrES club, a community of technophiles who explore the depths of cyberspace and unravel the secrets of the digital world.
